ModMetaData.name: StarWars - Gand Species
ModMetaData.author: JangoD'soul
ModMetaData.description:
" insectoid sentient species native to the planet Gand that breathed ammonia, forcing them to wear respirators to survive in oxygen-rich atmospheres"
[h1]Features:[/h1] - Gand Race - Gand Faction - Zuckuss Apparel - GRS-1 Snare Rifle
[h1]ResearchPrerequisite:[/h1] - FlakArmor: Zuckuss Apparel - Fabrication: GRS-1 Snare Rifle
Commissioned for "MeatyClackers#6999" from "Rimworld Mod Market" Discord.
[h1]Credits:[/h1] -StarsWars -JangoDsoul- Art and XML coder
